content: If a water tank is filled at a rate of 10 gallons per minute, how long will it take to fill a 500-gallon tank?

To determine how long it will take to fill a 500-gallon tank at a rate of 10 gallons per minute, you can use the formula:

Time = Total Volume / Flow Rate

Plugging in the given values:

Time = 500 gallons / 10 gallons per minute = 50 minutes

So, it will take 50 minutes to fill the tank.
